<title>Tackling Depression Through Physical Activity - HeadsUpGuys</title>
<meta name="description" content="Commitment to a sustainable routine of being physically active in your day-to-day life can help ease symptoms of depression in both the short and long term." />

yoast_head_json.description: Commitment to a sustainable routine of being physically active in your day-to-day life can help ease symptoms of depression in both the short and long term.

@graph.name: Tackling Depression Through Physical Activity - HeadsUpGuys
@graph.description: Commitment to a sustainable routine of being physically active in your day-to-day life can help ease symptoms of depression in both the short and long term.

@graph.name: Quinn Storey
@graph.description: Quinn has always taken a keen interest in mental health and the factors that affect it. Since beginning his studies at UBC, this interest has developed into an examination of how our daily behaviours promote or undermine our general well-being. Quinn supports the ideals of HeadsUpGuys and hopes to help those in need of assistance with his contributions to the team
